name: Elika In Love
address: Elika In Love, 416-2050 Scotia Street Buzz #136, Vancouver, BC V5T 4T1

featured_reviews.review_id:
This day would of not been complete without my dress.
After struggling to find anything different in wedding dresses I contacted Hrissa at Elika in Love. I had seen a picture of the dress I loved but it wasn't in stock. So I went in for a consultation to see what we could do.
Over 30 swatches of lace later I picked the lace I thought was pretty.
You can imagine how thrilled I was when it turned out to be stunning with tiny tasteful sequins, the perfect accent to my winter wedding.
Through my meetings with Hrissa she hand crafted the dress of my dreams. I never thought I'd get the "say yes to the dress" feeling but I couldn't stop smiling.
And on the day of my wedding I didn't want to take it off, stunning and comfortable.
I can't wait to have the reception so I can wear it again.

featured_reviews.review_id: It was a pleasure to meet Hrissa and her beautiful gowns. I had a wonderful experience trying on her own creations as well as other affordable lines she carries in her studio. Would recommend stopping by this Mount Pleasant jewel for any one looking for a one-of-a-kind dress!
featured_reviews.review_text: It was a pleasure to meet Hrissa and her beautiful gowns. I had a wonderful experience trying on her own creations as well as other affordable lines she carries in her studio. Would recommend stopping by this Mount Pleasant jewel for any one looking for a one-of-a-kind dress!

featured_reviews.review_id:
Wow, where to begin! Hrissa, was soooo nice and informative during my visit. To be honest with you I've probably visited about 9 store before I came to this one and she was the nicest out of all those other bridal stores. I actually was eyeing another dress online and they didn't have it in stock to try. Hrissa, took the time to show me on a mannequin how the dress might look on me. Because she is a designer as well, she gave me a lot of insight on dresses that would look good on my body. While I didn't find my dress this visit with her, she gave me a lot of pointers on what to look for in the future.

Also the dresses she designs herself are just gorgeous, definitely visit this spot (very boho/New York fashion week!)! Her designs are just soooo dreamyyy

featured_reviews.review_id: Hrissa is a top notch bespoke designer. From the moment I visited her studio, she's greeted me with a warm attitude without compromising any professionalism. I love the fabrics she chooses for each of her dress (they are so unique and form-fitting!). Hrissa's designs are extremely romantic and flattering. She is also great at communicating and following up to make sure I get all my questions answered. This is so important for a custom piece. I am so happy with my service with Hrissa at Elika in Love! Thank you so much! xx
featured_reviews.review_text: Hrissa is a top notch bespoke designer. From the moment I visited her studio, she's greeted me with a warm attitude without compromising any professionalism. I love the fabrics she chooses for each of her dress (they are so unique and form-fitting!). Hrissa's designs are extremely romantic and flattering. She is also great at communicating and following up to make sure I get all my questions answered. This is so important for a custom piece. I am so happy with my service with Hrissa at Elika in Love! Thank you so much! xx

featured_reviews.review_id: I loved the dress that I bought from Elika in Love - it was flowy and perfect and fit like a dream. It was important to me during my wedding to work with designers who made beautiful things, particularly if they were involved in the process. So, on a trip to Vancouver I met Hrissa and ended up buying the first dress I tried on! It was lovely and perfect and looks as great in the photos as it felt to wear it. I also loved that I was able to get the dress in a colour that was verging on cream -- I have never felt really good wearing white or even ivory. And it matched the day and my husband's suit perfectly. Pro tip: Because if the train, the Athena works really well if you get married on a windy day.

featured_reviews.review_id: Hrissa created my ultimate dream dress!! She went above and beyond to make me feel comfortable and involved in the process. This experience was a million times better than buying from a large store where you never get to meet the actual designer and creator of your wedding dress. This whole process was so much fun and the dress is even better than what I imagined! If I could give you more stars I would - thank you Hrissa!
featured_reviews.review_text: Hrissa created my ultimate dream dress!! She went above and beyond to make me feel comfortable and involved in the process. featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Alex, thank you for the wonderful review! It was an absolute dream working with you to make your Elle gown customized specifically for you:) Thanks for taking the plunge with Elika In Love, and making the trips from Kelowna all the way to Vancouver for your fittings! Can't wait to see the photos from the wedding! xx Hrissa

featured_reviews.review_id:
Hrissa and her designs are so equally charming and beautiful. I went to her after seeing her "Elle" gown featured in a BC Wedding Magazine.
And I'm so glad I did!

Dresses are tried on in Hrissa's well-lit studio and it already feels like magic with the bright surroundings and personalized experience. Although professional, Hrissa is not precious with her designs and truly works with the wearer to tailor the dress to fit the married vision of the designer and the wearer. She's open to requests for custom tweaks, and makes recommendations when the need to be lead is evidenced.

If you're looking for a romantic dress and experience, Elika In Love is the perfect studio to do so. Thank you, Hrissa!

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: You are the loveliest, Olivia!!! Amazing energy and an absolute joy to work with. xx Hrissa

featured_reviews.review_id: Hrissa is a true visionary. Her bridal designs are stunning, unique and thoughtful. The styles range from beautiful boho to sexy glam. I love that each dress is handmade. She really goes above and beyond to understand her clients vision for their wedding day to create memorable bridal gowns.
featured_reviews.review_text: Hrissa is a true visionary. Her bridal designs are stunning, unique and thoughtful. The styles range from beautiful boho to sexy glam.
